alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 522 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Juniper to 12 miles southwest of Howell. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brigham City, Tremonton, Snowville, Wellsville, Bear River City, Corinne, Plymouth, Howell, Riverside, Peter, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Garland, Honeyville, Elwood, Fielding, Deweyville, Portage, Collinston, Penrose and Locomotive Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 365 and 400. Interstate 84 between mile markers 1 and 42. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 66 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
